snippet.title: Might & Magic Duel of Champions - Forgotten Wars Launch Trailer [UK]
snippet.description:
The Forgotten Wars have begun!
 Master the arcane powers of Magic with the Academy, the brand new faction!
Discover all the 148 new cards and new features of the expansion: http://bit.ly/1b5CRnd

Play the game for free: http://bit.ly/18YtJu1

Follow us on Facebook: http://on.fb.me/12sbCcA
